txt.en: You have found nothing here
In the distance, you see a large Easterling encampment
In the distance, you see a lone tree standing...or is it a tree?
Céola is concerned that the brigand threat in the Brown Lands will make it impossible to even attempt to hinder the Khundolar.
You have discovered Helstor, the brigand hideaway

'Our scouts have been too frightened by the creatures of the Brown Lands that I think they have not been thorough in their patrols. We have yet to learn the location of the brigand hideaway here.

'However, I deem we must find it soon, for if the brigands are not dealt with, I fear it will be impossible for us to even attempt to hinder the advance of the Khundolar.

'Would you make a patrol of the Brown Lands and see if you can learn the location of the brigands' encampment? You need not engage the enemy...only learn their location.'
The brigand hideaway is located somewhere in the Brown Lands.\n\nCéola has asked you to scout the first patrol point for the location of the brigand hideaway.

'Very good, [placeholder]! This Helstor must be where the brigands are delivering the relics they have stolen from Parth Celebrant. Though I must admit, the size of the encampment is frightening.\n\n'What is this? You have seen Lashkarg, the war-camp of the Khundolar? Your description is fearsome...even with the brigands disposed of, I am concerned. I think it best if we leave the Easterlings alone for the present.'
The brigand hideaway is located somewhere in the Brown Lands.\n\nCéola has asked you to scout the second patrol point for the location of the brigand hideaway.
The brigand hideaway is located somewhere in the Brown Lands.\n\nCéola has asked you to scout the third patrol point for the location of the brigand hideaway.
'Have you found the brigand camp yet?'
The brigand hideaway is located somewhere in the Brown Lands.\n\nCéola has asked you to scout the fourth patrol point for the location of the brigand hideaway.
'Have you found the brigand camp yet?'
Céola is at Etheburg, south of Helstor, in the Brown Lands.\n\nYou should return to Céola with news of your success.
'Have you found the brigand camp yet?'
Scout the first patrol point
'Have you found the brigand camp yet?'
Scout the second patrol point
Scout the third patrol point
Scout the fourth patrol point
Hide and Seek
Talk to Céola at Etheburg in the Brown Lands
